text: Rhombosolea is a genus of righteye flounders. The four species in this genus can be found in the waters around New Zealand and southern Australia. ==Species== There are currently four recognized species in this genus: * Rhombosolea leporina Günther, 1862 (Yellowbelly flounder) * Rhombosolea plebeia (Richardson, 1843) (Sand flounder) * Rhombosolea retiaria Hutton, 1874 (Black flounder) * Rhombosolea tapirina Günther, 1862 (Greenback flounder) == References == Category:Marine fish genera Category:Taxa named by Albert Günther
title: Rhombosolea
